Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: M. Salas
Reviews.Content: Runs super fast and smooth! The games look and run amazing. The thinner and lighter design is a definite plus but the camera still sucks and takes lousy pictures. Battery life lasts typical use for the whole day.

Reviews.Title: iPads priced above retail on Amazon.  Shop elsewhere like me.
Reviews.Author: JB Bednarcyk
Reviews.Content: Love the ipad Air, hate Amazon's insistence to make the Kindle look better by pricing the iPads ABOVE retail!!!  ...Rip off...I get that they are competitors in the tablet space, but I trusted Amazon to be my first visit cyberstore.  Now in my estimation they are the same as the rest.
